group_1.narration: It's finally time for the student council@sponsored Dark-Colored Halloween Party!
Among the attractions@was the ever so slight horror experience@run by students dressed as "nobodies"—@the "Everlasting Darkness Tour"...

group_1.textRight: You good if I set the box of candy here?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're a big help carrying it.@Sorry to keep you so busy.

group_1.textRight: The feeling's mutual, so don't worry about it!

group_1.textCenter: Alright, it's about time for me too. I need to@get back to being the "nameless dancer".

group_1.textRight: I see you're working.

group_1.textLeft: Akira! You showed up!

group_1.textRight: I heard rumors of the event so I thought@I'd come take a peek.
And now that I'm here...that's an amazing outfit.

group_1.textLeft: I told them I wanted something easy to move in,@but it ended up more like a swimsuit...

group_1.textRight: No one in the area's wearing anything like yours,@so it stands out way more.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300251:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Ugh...it does.

group_1.textRight: But like, why did you dress so loosely?

group_1.textLeft: I guess I just wanted to jump in and start helping@people as soon as I could.

group_1.textRight: Heeh, that sounds like my Natsuki.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, and...
[chara:300251:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah...!@Sorry, give me a second.

group_1.textRight: Natsuki?!
[chara:801300:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I'm scared of ghooosts!!@Waaaahh!!

group_1.textLeft: Mmngh...how awkward...@I tried to keep my acting mild, and yet...

group_1.textRight: Let me guess, it happened again?

group_1.textLeft: It pains me to ask even though you are acting@as well, Utsuho... Apologies, but could I also leave@this one to you?

group_1.textRight: Please let me take care of it!
Uuu...ghosts are scary~...

group_1.textLeft: Look, she left the area and vanished!

group_1.textRight: *Sniffle...* *Sniffle...*@[chara:801300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:801300:lipSynch_1][chara:801300:effect_shake]Waaaahh!!

group_1.textLeft: (Well I'll be darned~...@He's really got it bad.)
(Then it's come to this...!)
In that case, I'll put a good luck charm on you.

group_1.textRight: *Sniffle...*@Good luck charm...?

group_1.textLeft: It's just the thing to give you the courage@to face the ghost!
YOU CAN DO IT!@GO FIGHT WIN!!
Well? Feeling braver?

group_1.textRight: It's real...@All my fear is gone.
Maybe now I can try it one more time!

group_1.textLeft: Sure thing!@Sounds like you're okay!
And if you ever feel scared again, just remember@this good luck charm:
"I CAN DO IT"!@You can yell this one out yourself, got it?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I got it!@Thank you, Miss!

group_1.textLeft: Phew~@I'm glad he found the courage.

group_1.textRight: That's like a haunted house, so it's gotta be scary@for kids.

group_1.textLeft: Yep.
That's why I had them design my costume@to let me cheer people on.

group_1.textRight: Oh, that's what you meant by being easy to move in.

group_1.textLeft: When I cried in a haunted house a long time ago,
the ghost's staff cheered "you'll be absolutely okay!"@to keep me going,
and because they encouraged me,
if I see the same thing happen,@I want to cheer them on.
I was a little embarrassed actually trying this on,
but with this costume it's hard for people to get@scared. Well...I guess it turned out alright!

group_1.textCenter: Utsuho! Apologies, but may I ask for your@assistance again?!

group_1.textLeft: Ah— ...Right, work!@Okay, see you around, Akira!
Yes, yeees! I'll be right oveeer!

group_1.textRight: Ah— ...There she goes...@Must be rough for her...
...Well...@If Natsuki's having fun then it's cool.

group_1.narration: In the end, it was a very busy day, but I saw@way more smiling faces than crying ones,@so I think it turned out to be@a very fulfilling Halloween.
And so...@All is good and well!
